titleStmt.title: The fox-chace: or, The huntsmens harmony, by the noble Duke of Buckingham's hounds, [et]c. To an excellent tune much in request. Licens'd and enter'd according to order.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by and for W.O. and sold by the booksellers of Pye-corner and London-bridge.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
